AD_AfterPoisoning_008.synopsis: After several goblins at the camp are poisoned, survivors comment on what happened. Paranoid about what happened, but pleased to have survived.

AD_ChickenChaseSpectator.synopsis: Spectators at the age-old goblin sport of chicken chasing.

AD_Kid_001_Booyahg.synopsis: Goblin kid run away in fear after being hit by "magic" (booyahg).

AD_GoblinSleeper_01_EnterCombat.synopsis: A goblin enters combat against the players

AD_TakeRefill_000.synopsis: AD when the goblin goes to refill his/her beer.

AD_AfterPoisoning_004.synopsis: After several goblins at the camp are poisoned, survivors comment on what happened. Paranoid about what happened, but pleased to have survived.

AD_Ogre_00.synopsis: An ogre standing guard - he's pretty stupid, and has more eyes for the chicken than the player.

AD_Kid_000_Booyahg.synopsis: Goblin kid run away in fear after being hit by "magic" (booyahg).

AD_Table4.synopsis: This goblin is just back from a raid. He's sitting at a barrel with some pints - drinking and talking shite.

AD_AfterPoisoning_005.synopsis: After several goblins at the camp are poisoned, survivors comment on what happened. Paranoid about what happened, but pleased to have survived.

AD_TakeRefill_001.synopsis: AD when the goblin goes to refill his/her beer.

Trader_AD.synopsis: Grat is selling items laid out on a blanket in the middle of a drunken celebration in the goblin camp. He's not participating in the drinking - he expects to make a good bit of coin off his drunk mates.

AD_AfterPoisoning_009.synopsis: After several goblins at the camp are poisoned, survivors comment on what happened. Paranoid about what happened, but pleased to have survived.

AD_AfterPoisoning_002.synopsis: After several goblins at the camp are poisoned, survivors comment on what happened. Paranoid about what happened, but pleased to have survived.

AD_GoblinSleeper_00_EnterCombat.synopsis: A goblin enters combat against the players

AD_Table3.synopsis: The goblin is back from a raid. He's drunk, partying and having a good time. He's at a table, talking shite with some of his friends.

AD_Kid_000_Damaged.synopsis: Goblin kid run away in fear and surrender after being heavily hit.

AD_TakeRefill_006.synopsis: AD when the goblin goes to refill his/her beer.

AD_TakeRefill_007.synopsis: AD when the goblin goes to refill his/her beer.

AD_Kid_001_Damaged.synopsis: Goblin kid run away in fear and surrender after being heavily hit.

Trader_AD_AfterPoisoning.synopsis: AD plays after several goblins fall ill from poisoned beer. Grat doesn't drink the beer. He just shakes his head after they start getting sick.

AD_Table2.synopsis: goblins talking to each other during a party

AD_Kids.synopsis: Goblin kids talking while standing over the corpse of a dead adventurer.

AD_AfterPoisoning_003.synopsis: After several goblins at the camp are poisoned, survivors comment on what happened. Paranoid about what happened, but pleased to have survived.

PAD_LooseWall.synopsis: Player notices a loose wall that can be destroyed. Behind that wall a secret passage into inner Goblin Camp would be found.

AD_Table1.synopsis: Goblins talking to each other at a party

AD_AfterPoisoning_000.synopsis: After several goblins at the camp are poisoned, survivors comment on what happened. Paranoid about what happened, but pleased to have survived.

AD_TakeRefill_004.synopsis: AD when the goblin goes to refill his/her beer.

AD_BugbearSleeper_00_EnterCombat.synopsis: A bugbear enters combat against the players

AD_TakeRefill_005.synopsis: AD when the goblin goes to refill his/her beer.

AD_AfterPoisoning_001.synopsis: After several goblins at the camp are poisoned, survivors comment on what happened. Paranoid about what happened, but pleased to have survived.

AD_SleepersHelp.synopsis: Alerting the others to combat. Urgent!

AD_DemandingPants.synopsis: A goblin who has had his breeches stolen tries to buy more from a merchant, but doesn't have any money

AD_TakeRefill_002.synopsis: AD when the goblin goes to refill his/her beer.

AD_AfterPoisoning_010.synopsis: After several goblins at the camp are poisoned, survivors comment on what happened. Paranoid about what happened, but pleased to have survived.

AD_BugbearSleeper_01_EnterCombat.synopsis: Guttural, sinister snarled words as a bugbear enters combat

AD_GoblinSleeper_02_EnterCombat.synopsis: A goblin enters combat against the players

AD_AfterPoisoning_006.synopsis: After several goblins at the camp are poisoned, survivors comment on what happened. Paranoid about what happened, but pleased to have survived.

AD_AfterPoisoning_007.synopsis: After several goblins at the camp are poisoned, survivors comment on what happened. Paranoid about what happened, but pleased to have survived.

AD_TakeRefill_003.synopsis: AD when the goblin goes to refill his/her beer.

AD_ChickenChaseSpectator_0.speaker: Sharp-Eye Mirg
AD_ChickenChaseSpectator_0.text: Careful now - that's our last chicken!
AD_ChickenChaseSpectator_0.context: NodeContext: Discussing the chicken that's being chased on the field. Calling out from a height down to the players.  Commenting as if it were a ball.

AD_ChickenChaseSpectator_3.speaker: Brawler Rot
AD_ChickenChaseSpectator_3.text: Yeah, don't hurt the little clucker. Just chase it through the posts!
AD_ChickenChaseSpectator_3.context: NodeContext: Calling out from a height down to the players. Not concerned - just matter of fact. They plan to eat it once it's finished the game.

AD_ChickenChaseSpectator_1.speaker: Warlock Gurk
AD_ChickenChaseSpectator_1.text: Ain't we gonna cook it once the game's done?
AD_ChickenChaseSpectator_1.context: NodeContext: Said to the goblin next to him. Excited at the thought of eating the chicken.

AD_ChickenChaseSpectator_2.speaker: Sharp-Eye Mirg
AD_ChickenChaseSpectator_2.text: That's what the fire's for, innit?
AD_ChickenChaseSpectator_2.context: NodeContext: Referencing the fire that's used as part of the game. As if explaining to an idiot. Actually explaining to an idiot.

AD_GoblinSleeper_01_EnterCombat_0.speaker: Tracker Dullwill
AD_GoblinSleeper_01_EnterCombat_0.context: NodeContext: A warcry while entering combat

AD_AfterPoisoning_004_0.speaker: Sharp-Eye Mirg
AD_AfterPoisoning_004_0.text: How was I s'posed to know the beer was poisoned?

AD_Ogre_00_1.speaker: Guard Gurgon
AD_Ogre_00_1.context: NodeContext: The ogre is trying to lure the chicken to him, so he can eat it.

AD_Ogre_00_2.speaker: Guard Gurgon
AD_Ogre_00_2.context: NodeContext: The ogre is trying to lure the chicken to him, so he can eat it.

AD_Ogre_00_4.speaker: Guard Gurgon
AD_Ogre_00_4.context: NodeContext: The ogre is mad because someone poisoned the beer, and he's imagining what he'll do once he finds that person.

AD_Ogre_00_5.speaker: Guard Gurgon
AD_Ogre_00_5.context: NodeContext: The ogre is trying to lure the chicken to him, so he can eat it.

AD_Table4_0.speaker: Warlock Gurk
AD_Table4_0.text: Hope the bard tastes better than he sings!
AD_Table4_0.context: NodeContext: Making a joke about the prisoner they're forcing to sing to entertain them. Said with a nudge and a laugh.

AD_Table4_1.speaker: Warlock Gurk
AD_Table4_1.text: Got a fella in the guts durin' the raid. It was bloody fantastic.
AD_Table4_1.context: NodeContext: guts is slurred. Very drunk at this stage. Boastful and drunken stories.

AD_Table4_2.speaker: Warlock Gurk
AD_Table4_2.text: Knock it back, lads! No slowin' down.

AD_Table4_3.speaker: Warlock Gurk
AD_Table4_3.text: You was brilliant in the raid, lads. Beautiful stuff!
AD_Table4_3.context: NodeContext: Like saying 'I love you so much' to you friends when you're drunk and a goblin.

AD_Table4_4.speaker: Warlock Gurk
AD_Table4_4.text: One of the inn-whelps pulled a dagger on me - against me axe! Bloody idiot.
AD_Table4_4.context: NodeContext: Telling stories of the raid. Very drunk talk, slapping chest kinda tales.

AD_AfterPoisoning_005_0.speaker: Tracker Puli
AD_AfterPoisoning_005_0.text: How am I still standin'? I drank more than any of 'em.
AD_AfterPoisoning_005_0.context: NodeContext: anxious - friends have been poisoned

AD_TakeRefill_001_0.speaker: Warrior Sul
AD_TakeRefill_001_0.text: How many did you have? Five? That's nothin'.
AD_TakeRefill_001_0.context: NodeContext: He's talking down to the goblin next to him, and boasting about himself.

AD_TakeRefill_001_1.speaker: Warrior Sul
AD_TakeRefill_001_1.text: This is gonna be my ninth... no - tenth cup.
AD_TakeRefill_001_1.context: NodeContext: He's talking down to the goblin next to him, and boasting about himself.

Trader_AD_0.speaker: Grat the Trader
Trader_AD_0.context: NodeContext: Talking about a bard who is doing a *terrible* job

Trader_AD_1.speaker: Grat the Trader
Trader_AD_1.text: Keep that bird away from the merchandise!
Trader_AD_1.context: NodeContext: Shouting at a chicken running around teh camp

Trader_AD_2.speaker: Grat the Trader
Trader_AD_2.text: Someone ought to roast that chicken.

Trader_AD_3.speaker: Grat the Trader
Trader_AD_3.text: Supplies! New batch from Waukeen's Rest!

Trader_AD_4.speaker: Grat the Trader
Trader_AD_4.context: NodeContext: Shouting to the other goblins

Trader_AD_5.speaker: Grat the Trader
Trader_AD_5.text: You lot spend more when you're boozed up.

Trader_AD_6.speaker: Grat the Trader
Trader_AD_6.text: Oi! Who took the innkeep's ring? It weren't for sale!
Trader_AD_6.context: NodeContext: Shouting to the other goblins

AD_AfterPoisoning_009_0.speaker: Tracker Klagga
AD_AfterPoisoning_009_0.text: Some nasty bugger's got it in for us.

AD_AfterPoisoning_002_0.speaker: Tracker Tak
AD_AfterPoisoning_002_0.text: Murderin' us with our own beer - that's proper cruel.

AD_GoblinSleeper_00_EnterCombat_0.speaker: Sharp-Eye Raagg
AD_GoblinSleeper_00_EnterCombat_0.context: NodeContext: directed at the player as the goblin enters battle

AD_Table3_0.speaker: Sharp-Eye Aggy
AD_Table3_0.text: Go on! Give the worgs some booze! They'll love it.
AD_Table3_0.context: NodeContext: Actually thinks this is a terrible idea, but is trying to egg his friend on.

AD_Table3_1.speaker: Sharp-Eye Aggy
AD_Table3_1.text: Sing the saucy one about the bugbear and the ogre!
AD_Table3_1.context: NodeContext: shouting at a singer on a nearby stage - excited

AD_Table3_2.speaker: Sharp-Eye Aggy
AD_Table3_2.context: NodeContext: Proper drunk at this stage. Raises his glass in a 'cheers' fashion.

AD_Table3_3.speaker: Sharp-Eye Aggy
AD_Table3_3.context: NodeContext:  Knocking back a drink and smacking his lips as he is getting drunker. Happy to have a pint in hand.

AD_Table3_4.speaker: Sharp-Eye Aggy
AD_Table3_4.text: I'm bloody starvin'. They finished cookin' that dwarf yet?
AD_Table3_4.context: NodeContext: Moaning tone as he almost drools at the thought of roasted dwarf.

AD_TakeRefill_006_0.speaker: Sharp-Eye Aggy
AD_TakeRefill_006_0.text: Nothin' beats the taste of stolen beer.

AD_TakeRefill_007_0.speaker: Warlock Gurk
AD_TakeRefill_007_0.text: Empty again? These mugs got holes in 'em or somethin'?

AD_Table2_1.speaker: Brawler Rot
AD_Table2_1.text: We eatin' that chicken wot woz runnin' about the place?
AD_Table2_1.context: NodeContext: tipsy; asking a sincere question

AD_Table2_6.speaker: Tracker Tak
AD_Table2_6.text: Rather have dwarf myself - smells good an' ready, don't it?
AD_Table2_6.context: NodeContext: referring to a dwarf roasting on a spit nearby; very hungry

AD_Table2_2.speaker: Tracker Tak
AD_Table2_2.text: Sing louder or we'll cook ya!
AD_Table2_2.context: NodeContext: yelling at a captive human singing on a stage

AD_Table2_3.speaker: Warrior Sul
AD_Table2_3.text: Should've let that dwarf run around a bit before we cooked 'im.
AD_Table2_3.context: NodeContext: talking to a friend, thoughtful

AD_Table2_5.speaker: Brawler Rot
AD_Table2_5.text: Yeah. And given 'im a good kickin' ta tenderise the meat.

AD_Table2_4.speaker: Warrior Sul
AD_Table2_4.text: Innkeeper's guts spilled out... I wore 'em like a belt. That put the fear in the rest of 'em.
AD_Table2_4.context: NodeContext: telling what is to him an amusing story

AD_Table2_0.speaker: Tracker Tak
AD_Table2_0.text: It's the drow that put the fear in 'em. Creepy bastards scare me, and we're on the same side.

AD_Kids_2.speaker: Eight
AD_Kids_2.text: You seen one of them gnolls up close? Proper scary.

AD_Kids_0.speaker: Five
AD_Kids_0.text: A gnoll ate my brother. Swallowed 'im whole!
AD_Kids_0.context: NodeContext: not too upset about this - it's more a cool story than a horrifying one

AD_Kids_4.speaker: Four
AD_Kids_4.text: This ugly bastard is the first human I ever killed.
AD_Kids_4.context: CinematicNodeContext: gesturing at a dead adventurer at his feetNodeContext: pleased with himself, referring to a dead adventurer at his feet

AD_Kids_1.speaker: Five
AD_Kids_1.text: Should take a trophy - cut off his ear.
AD_Kids_1.context: NodeContext: pleased with himself - malicious - referring to the dead adventurer at his feet

AD_Kids_6.speaker: Five
AD_Kids_6.text: Wot do you call a drow's knickers?
AD_Kids_6.context: NodeContext: set up for a joke

AD_AfterPoisoning_003_0.speaker: Brawler Rot
AD_AfterPoisoning_003_0.text: Poisonings for cowards. Should find 'em and kill 'em.
AD_AfterPoisoning_003_0.context: NodeContext: furious - his friends have been poisoned

AD_Table1_3.speaker: Sharp-Eye Mirg
AD_Table1_3.text: Wozzat...? I think I 'eard the Absolute's voice just now.

AD_Table1_2.speaker: Tracker Puli
AD_Table1_2.text: That's the drink talkin'. Absolute wouldn't speak to a worm like you.

AD_Table1_9.speaker: Tracker Puli
AD_Table1_9.text: Gotta be chosen to hear Her. Like the boss an' priestess.

AD_Table1_6.speaker: Sharp-Eye Mirg
AD_Table1_6.text: Humans ain't good for much, but they make tasty beer.
AD_Table1_6.context: NodeContext: tipsy, pleased, commenting on the beer she's drinking

AD_Table1_0.speaker: Tracker Puli
AD_Table1_0.text: Tastes even better when you nick it outta their cold, dead 'ands.

AD_Table1_7.speaker: Sharp-Eye Mirg
AD_Table1_7.text: Don't this stupid human know any good goblin warsongs?
AD_Table1_7.context: NodeContext: reacting to a human singing on a stage nearby

AD_Table1_1.speaker: Tracker Puli
AD_Table1_1.text: My rat sings better than him!

AD_Table1_8.speaker: Sharp-Eye Mirg
AD_Table1_8.text: You goin' on the next raid? Bring me back sumfin' pretty
AD_Table1_8.context: NodeContext: As if lying on a couch while someone's going to the store.

AD_Table1_4.speaker: Tracker Puli
AD_Table1_4.text: Get off yer arse and do yer own killin'!

AD_Table1_5.speaker: Sharp-Eye Mirg
AD_Table1_5.text: Aw, come on. I'm wounded! That wizard burned me sumfin' proper.

AD_Table1_10.speaker: Tracker Puli
AD_Table1_10.text: For the last time, that weren't a wizard. It was a bloke with a torch!

AD_AfterPoisoning_000_0.speaker: Devout Mezzka
AD_AfterPoisoning_000_0.text: My guts hurt. Hope I ain't poisoned.

AD_BugbearSleeper_00_EnterCombat_0.speaker: Stimk
AD_BugbearSleeper_00_EnterCombat_0.context: NodeContext: almost a snarl, low, guttural

AD_AfterPoisoning_001_0.speaker: Warrior Sul
AD_AfterPoisoning_001_0.text: I knew there was somethin' wrong with that beer.
AD_AfterPoisoning_001_0.context: NodeContext: he's been enthusiastically drinking the beer, but sees his friends dying from poison and tries to sound smart - anxious

AD_SleepersHelp_0.speaker: Booyahg Culk, Tracker Dullwill, Sharp-Eye Raagg, Stimk, Teghun

AD_DemandingPants_4.speaker: Tracker Klagga
AD_DemandingPants_4.context: NodeContext: sheepish, talking to a merchant

AD_DemandingPants_3.speaker: Roah Moonglow
AD_DemandingPants_3.context: NodeContext: Eyeing a prospective customer up and down and not finding him likely

AD_DemandingPants_1.speaker: Tracker Klagga
AD_DemandingPants_1.text: Got nothin'. Kept it all in my old breeches, and somebody robbed 'em!
AD_DemandingPants_1.context: NodeContext: unhappy - his money was in his breeches, and someone stole them. Emphasis on 'old' refers to the stolen breeches

AD_DemandingPants_2.speaker: Roah Moonglow
AD_DemandingPants_2.text: Here - free of charge. Consider it a public service on my part.
AD_DemandingPants_2.context: NodeContext: Long-suffering, not looking at him directly.

AD_DemandingPants_0.speaker: Roah Moonglow
AD_DemandingPants_0.text: Yours can be keeping them on, hm?

AD_TakeRefill_002_0.speaker: Tracker Tak
AD_TakeRefill_002_0.context: NodeContext: Eager and good-natured. She wants the others to go so she can get a drink.

AD_AfterPoisoning_010_0.speaker: Tracker Grikka
AD_AfterPoisoning_010_0.text: Meat might be poisoned, too. Don't trust nothin' anymore.

AD_GoblinSleeper_02_EnterCombat_0.speaker: Booyahg Culk
AD_GoblinSleeper_02_EnterCombat_0.context: NodeContext: shouted at players as the goblin enters combat

AD_AfterPoisoning_006_0.speaker: Sharp-Eye Aggy
AD_AfterPoisoning_006_0.text: Absolute spared me from the poisonin'. Must love me best.
AD_AfterPoisoning_006_0.context: NodeContext: Pleased to have survived a poisoning at their camp - anxious, but relatively happy

AD_AfterPoisoning_007_0.speaker: Warlock Gurk
AD_AfterPoisoning_007_0.text: Hope Priestess Gut can cure poisonin'...
AD_AfterPoisoning_007_0.context: NodeContext: some of his friends have been poisoned -he's worried he'll need a healer soon if he's poisoned too
